portfolio.title: Code Colab
portfolio.description: Real time collaborative coding platform with integrated video conference,This project aims to enable multiple users to remotely code together via integrated video in the same interface.Allowing real-time code editing, updating and syncing

portfolio.title: Smart Auto-Sharing App
portfolio.description: Developed a location - based ride - sharing platform that connects solo passengers with nearby commuters traveling in the same direction,enabling them to share auto rides.reducing average ride costs by 25 % and minimize traffic congestion.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.description: My portfolio, built with React.js, showcases my  Personal Information, Skills, Projects, and Contact details. It highlights my full-stack development expertise and provides an interactive way to explore my work and connect with me.
